description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5m in depth, maximum height of 3m and eaves height of 3m)
decision_conditions: The development complies with the criteria set out in Schedule 2, Part, 1 Class A ofthe Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015

Reasonable efforts have been made to check that the plans submitted for the purposes of this planning application are consistent from one to the next, and that the development hereby approved can be implemented in accordance with all of the plans submitted. Should it transpire that this is not possible and that your plans are flawed, please be clear that it may be impossible to implement this permission, and that any development undertaken which relies on this permission may be unauthorised and subject to enforcement action.

As the previous planning Application  referred to has not been implemented, you will be required to seek permission for the entire scheme again incorporating the new enlargement you are looking to achieve as part of this application.Please therefore, remove any references  to the previously  granted conscent, from both your application form and any drawings.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Minor works not adversely affecting public amenity or tree health.Recommendation:No objections.
